articles.author: Eric Berger
articles.title: Daily Telescope: The initial results from Europe's Euclid telescope are dazzling - Ars Technica
articles.description: "Euclid’s instruments can detect objects just a few times the mass of Jupiter."
articles.content:
Enlarge/ Messier 78 is a nursery of star formation enveloped in a shroud of interstellar dust.
